data.Column1:
## Our Work

The University of Chicago Medicine is advancing life-changing research and patient care, educating the future leaders in science and medicine, and
expanding access to leading-edge diagnostics and treatments.
- From pioneering organ transplantation to discovering breakthrough cancer treatments, our physicians and scientists have helped shape
modern medicine and continue to define its frontiers.
- We bring the brightest, most committed students and trainees to campus and equip them to tackle the most pressing medical and
scientific challenges of our time.
- Through innovation and collaboration, we provide comprehensive, state-of-the-art care that improves health outcomes for our patients and
help to ensure that more individuals and communities can benefit from world-class academic medicine.
data.Column2:
## Give

Your support makes the extraordinary possible, turning breakthroughs into everyday realities. Whether through direct donations, matching gifts, or
planned contributions, every contribution—large or small—helps propel our mission of research, education, and patient care forward.
data.Column3:
## Contact For questions about how you can make an impact at the University of Chicago Medicine, or about your recognition on the donor tribute wall or kiosk, please contact us at 773.702.6565 or givetomedicine@bsd.uchicago.edu. You can also write us at:
The University of Chicago Medicine and Biological Sciences Development
Gift Administration and Business Data
5235 S. Harper Court, 4th Floor
Chicago, IL 60615
data.QRCodeCaption: Support innovative research, patient care, and education today.
